system.prerequisites: Tzeentch Aligned, Hatred (Any One), Psy Rating 5
system.sustained: Psyker fires Psychic Bolt which can be dodged as if a ranged attack. If it hits target within range it deals 1d10+Psy Rating Energy Damage with Warp Weapon and Shocking Qualities. The Target also suffers 1d5 Non Permenant Characteristic Damage to their Intelligence, Willpower, and Fellowship every turn for a number of turns equal to the Degrees of Success on the Focus Power Test. This power does not effect plants, machines, or other non-intelligent creatures.
